mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TOURS T LEFT JOIN IMG I ON T.TOUR_NO = I.TOUR_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TOUR_NO, ROUND(AVG(RATING),1) AS RATING FROM REVIEWS GROUP BY TOUR_NO ) TEMP1 ON T.TOUR_NO = TEMP1.TOUR_NO INNER JOIN ( SELECT T1.THEME_NO, T1.THEME_NAME, T2.THEME_NO AS PARENT_NO, T2.THEME_NAME AS PARENT_NAME FROM THEME T1 INNER JOIN THEME T2 ON T1.THEME_PARENT_NO = T2.THEME_NO ) TEMP2 ON T.THEME_NO = TEMP2.THEME_NO WHERE T.DELETEYN = 'N' AND I.THUMBNAIL = 'Y' ORDER BY IFNULL(RATING, 0) DESC LIMIT 12 OFFSET 0

SELECT R.TOUR_NO, RATING, R.COMMENT AS COMMENT, R_CREATED_AT, T.TITLE, DURATION, PRICE, TOUR_DATE, FILE_PATH, THUMBNAIL, USER_FIRSTNAME, USER_LASTNAME FROM REVIEWS R INNER JOIN TOURS T ON T.TOUR_NO = R.TOUR_NO INNER JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_NO = R.USER_NO INNER JOIN IMG I ON I.TOUR_NO = R.TOUR_NO WHERE I.THUMBNAIL = 'Y' ORDER BY R_CREATED_AT DESC
